title: Create ProcessingService for folder operations
description: Extract folder processing logic into ProcessingService. Methods: process_folder(), rename_by_rating(), extract_metadata_from_folder().

title: Create Series/Season/Episode dataclasses
description: Create molim/core/models/series.py with Series, Season, and Episode dataclasses for TV series management.

title: Phase 4: Modern CLI with Click
description: Replace procedural scripts with proper Click-based CLI. Create commands for processing, statistics, search, and database management with progress bars and colored output.

title: Implement 'molim search' command
description: Create search command with filters: --director, --actor, --genre, --rating-min, --year. Display results in formatted table.

title: Phase 0: Testing Infrastructure & Verification
description: Create baseline tests before refactoring begins. Use TestData/ folder with sample movies and series to verify IMDb fetching, data parsing, and folder operations work correctly. Essential for ensuring refactoring doesn't break existing functionality.

title: Create IMDbService for API interactions
description: Create molim/core/services/imdb_service.py wrapping cinemagoer API. Include rate limiting, error handling, and retry logic. Methods: fetch_movie(), fetch_series(), search().

title: Create test_imdb_fetching.py for IMDb API
description: Test imdbAccess.py functions: fetchMovieData(), fetchSeriesData(). Use TestData/ folder samples. Verify: correct movie/series identification, metadata extraction (title, year, rating, cast, directors), proper error handling.
notes: RESOLVED: Switched from Python 3.14 to 3.11. All 8 IMDb tests now PASSING (previously skipped). cinemagoer works perfectly with Python 3.11.

title: Design SQLite database schema
description: Create schema.sql with tables: movies, series, people, genres, movie_people, movie_genres. Include indexes and foreign keys.

title: Setup pytest infrastructure for legacy code
description: Install pytest, pytest-cov, pytest-mock. Create tests/ directory with conftest.py for fixtures. Configure pytest.ini for test discovery. Create TestData fixtures for sample movies/series.

title: Create database connection manager
description: Create molim/infrastructure/database/connection.py with singleton DatabaseConnection class, connection pooling, and context manager support.

title: Cinemagoer 2025.5.19 has critical parser bugs
description:
**Problem**: cinemagoer development version (2025.5.19 from GitHub) has multiple parser bugs due to IMDb website redesign.

**Affected Data**:
- Cast: UNAVAILABLE (parser doesn't extract from new IMDb design)
- Runtime: UNAVAILABLE (parser doesn't extract)
- Producers: UNAVAILABLE (parser doesn't extract)
- Writers: UNAVAILABLE (parser doesn't extract)  
- Votes: Returns inflated counts by 10x (e.g., 22M instead of 2.2M)

**Working Data**:
- Title, Year, Rating, Directors, Genres (all work correctly)
- Votes (only with 'vote details' info set, but inflated 10x)

**Root Cause**: IMDb redesigned website, cinemagoer parsers incomplete/buggy

**Workarounds Implemented**:
1. Graceful degradation: code handles missing data with 'UNAVAILABLE' markers
2. Vote inflation fix: divide by 10 when votes > 10M
3. Clear logging: shows 'cinemagoer parser issue' messages

**Options**:
1. Wait for cinemagoer maintainers to fix (unknown timeline)
2. Switch to alternative API (TMDb, OMDb)
3. Debug/fix parsers ourselves and submit PR
4. Continue with partial data (current approach)

**Status**: Workarounds in place, application functional with degraded data

title: Implement Library browser tab
description: Create TreeView for movie library with columns (Name, Year, Rating, Director). Add search/filter panel and detail view.

title: Phase 6: Testing & Quality Assurance
description: Add comprehensive test suite with pytest. Create unit tests for all services and repositories, integration tests for database operations, and end-to-end tests for CLI commands.

title: Create test_folder_operations.py
description: Test fileOperations.py functions: getMovieNameFromFolder(), extractYearFromString(), folder name parsing. Use TestData/ samples to verify correct extraction.

title: Write unit tests for repositories
description: Create tests/unit/test_repositories.py with tests for MovieRepository, SeriesRepository CRUD operations using in-memory SQLite.

title: Create migration script from text files to database
description: Create scripts/migrate_to_db.py to read all existing 'Film data - *.txt' files and populate SQLite database. Include progress reporting and error handling.

title: Implement Processing tab
description: Create processing tab with folder selection, progress bar, and log output. Allow batch processing of new movies/series.

title: Phase 3: Business Logic Layer
description: Extract business logic into service layer. Create IMDbService, ProcessingService, and StatisticsService. Implement proper separation between data access and business rules.

title: Create test_processing_pipeline.py
description: Test processing.py end-to-end: processFolder() with TestData/ samples. Verify: folder scanning, IMDb lookup, data extraction, file writing. Mock IMDb API to avoid rate limits in tests.

title: Add CI-friendly test markers and mocking
description: Add pytest markers for @pytest.mark.slow (real IMDb API), @pytest.mark.unit (mocked). Create mock responses for TestData samples. Enable running tests without internet/API access.

title: Fix invalid escape sequences in myFolders.py
description: Convert all string paths to use raw strings (r'') or double backslashes to fix Python warnings about invalid escape sequences. Files: myFolders.py, MoLiM.py

title: Write unit tests for services
description: Create tests/unit/test_services.py with mocked tests for IMDbService, ProcessingService, StatisticsService.

title: Implement 'molim process' command
description: Create process command with options: --folder, --recursive, --dry-run. Include progress bar for batch processing.

title: Create test fixtures with known good data
description: Document expected results for TestData/ samples: correct titles, years, IMDb IDs. Create JSON fixtures with expected metadata. This serves as regression baseline.

title: Create config.yaml configuration system
description: Create config.yaml with all paths, IMDb settings, rating thresholds, and logging configuration. Implement Config singleton class with YAML loading and dot notation access.

title: Implement 'molim stats' command group
description: Create stats subcommands: directors, actors, genres, ratings. Include --format (table/json/csv) and --export options.

title: Write integration tests for database
description: Create tests/integration/test_database.py testing full database operations: migrations, complex queries, transactions.

title: Implement BaseRepository with CRUD operations
description: Create molim/core/repositories/base.py with generic BaseRepository class providing get(), save(), delete(), find_all() methods.

title: Setup Click CLI framework
description: Install Click and create molim/ui/cli/commands.py with main command group. Setup entry point in setup.py for 'molim' command.

title: Phase 1: Foundation & Cleanup
description: Fix immediate issues, create configuration system, setup logging, and reorganize project structure. This is the critical foundation for all subsequent refactoring work.

title: Reorganize into molim/ package structure
description: Create new directory structure: molim/core/, molim/infrastructure/, molim/ui/, molim/utils/. Move old files to legacy/ folder. Create all __init__.py files and setup.py.

title: Create Movie dataclass with validation
description: Create molim/core/models/movie.py with Movie dataclass. Include all fields (id, name, imdb_id, year, rating, genres, directors, cast, etc.) and methods (is_directed_by, has_genre, get_rating_category).

title: Phase 5: Tkinter GUI Implementation
description: Build desktop GUI using Tkinter with ttk widgets. Create main window with tabs for library browsing, statistics, processing, and settings. Implement MVVM pattern for separation.

title: Implement Statistics tab with charts
description: Create statistics tab with matplotlib charts: rating distribution, genre breakdown, top directors/actors. Add export options.

title: Setup pytest test framework
description: Install pytest, pytest-cov, pytest-mock. Create tests/ directory structure with unit/, integration/, and fixtures/. Setup pytest.ini and tox.ini.

title: Create StatisticsService for analytics
description: Create StatisticsService with methods: get_director_stats(), get_actor_stats(), get_genre_distribution(), get_rating_distribution().

title: Setup logging system with rotation
description: Create logging_config.py with console and rotating file handlers. Replace all print() statements with proper logging (logger.info, logger.error, etc.)

title: Remove commented-out code from MoLiM.py
description: Clean up MoLiM.py by removing all commented-out function calls and old code. Keep only active, working code.

title: Implement MovieRepository
description: Create movie_repository.py extending BaseRepository with movie-specific queries: find_by_director(), find_by_rating_range(), find_by_genre().

title: Design main window with menu and tabs
description: Create molim/ui/gui/main_window.py with menu bar, toolbar, and ttk.Notebook for tabs (Library, Statistics, Processing, Settings).

title: Phase 2: Data Layer Migration
description: Migrate from text file storage to SQLite database. Create modern data models with dataclasses, design database schema, implement Repository pattern, and migrate existing data.
